Chargement des packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rddtools)
```

Netoyage de la bdd
```{r}
dtair_clean <- dtair %>% 
  mutate(treat = factor(treat)) %>% 
  na.omit()
summary(dtair_clean)
```

Passage en rdd_data
```{r}
rdd_data <- rddtools::rdd_data(dtair_clean)
```
